body:
Hi,


I'm trying to run a -dds simulation using Daysim 4, but get the following error when I run gen_dc in -dds mode (gen_dc  file.hea -dds)
FATAL ERROR - ds_illum variable DDS_sensor_file not provided in header file
However, I can't find anything in the Daysim documentation that describes the "DDS_sensor_file" keyword / behaviour. I have successfully run this same header file in regular mode and I would have thought the sensor file should be the same.
Is there anywhere I can find this behaviour?


Thanks,




Reinier Zeldenrust
Environmental Designer


Atelier Ten
Environmental Design Consultants + Building Services Engineers


CIBSE Building Services Consultancy of the Year 2011
UK-GBC Sustainability Consultant of the Year 2009
